title: 90/247/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 March 1990 on the establishment of the Community support framework for Community structural assistance in the areas eligible for Objective 2 in Spain (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 March 1990
on the establishment of the Community support framework for Community structural assistance in the areas eligible for Objective 2 in Spain
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(90/247/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Community support framework for Community structural assistance in the areas eligible for Objective 2 in Spain, covering the period from 1 January 1989 to 31 December 1991, is hereby approved.
The Commission declares that it intends to contribute to the implementation of this Community support framework in accordance with the detailed provisions thereof and in compliance with the rules and guidelines governing the Structural Funds and the other existing financial instruments.

The Community support framework shall include the following essential information:
(a) a statement of the priorities for joint action:
- establishment and development of productive activities,
- protection and improvement of the environment,
- support for R & D and training facilities,
- improvement in the communications network;
- multipriority human resource development,
- preparatory, assessment and back-up measures;
(b) an outline of the forms of assistance to be provided;
(c) an indicative financing plan specifying, at constant 1989 prices, the total cost of the priorities adopted for joint action by the Community and the Member State concerned and, in addition, of existing national initiatives, that is ECU 1 759 730 000 for the whole period, together with the financial arrangements envisaged for budgetary assistance from the Community, broken down as follows:
(million ECU)
1.2 //  //  // ERDF   // 520   // ESF   // 159   //    //  // Total for Structural Funds   // 679   //    //
The resultant national financing required, that is ECU 987 970 000 for the public sector and ECU 92 760 000 for the private sector, may be partially covered by Community loans from the European Investment Bank and the the other lending instruments.
This declaration of intent is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 March 1990.
For the Commission
Bruce MILLAN
Member of the Commission
